title: UK devolution gives role to reg. separatist par...

content.question: Devolution in the United Kingdom has allowed

choices.label: separatist parties to have roles in Scotland and Wales
the union of Ireland and Northern Ireland
Scotland to join the European Union
Northern Ireland to establish a separate state

content.answer: separatist parties to have roles in Scotland and Wales

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
